name: Rich life simulator VR
description:
Life is difficult for everyone; everyone has bad days. Everyone has trouble in their life, because it doesn't matter how rich you are: Sickness and trouble and worry and love, these things will mess with you at every level of life. Rich life simulator VR is a simple way to feel yourself rich just wearing VR helmet.Gameplay
All you need to do is just to relax and enjoy beatiful view in "Theater Mode".
No boring typical VR gameplay, no moves - just chill!
